item.title: You have sent six council tax payment cards, 11th July
item.description:
Today I received this dump of deforested snail mail. My wife left this property 19 October 2024. It's painful, for me , when she left I asked for a single person discount..but it's transpired I'm not and I owe you a figure in excess of 3000.00 pound.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): New North Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees need cutting, 11th July
item.description:
Usually every year the trees are cut and it’s been a few years now (2019) and the trees aren’t cut. It’s blocking the sun from entering the property and I’m pregnant and it’s becoming extremely overwhelming. I can see others get sun in their gardens / properties but I literally get a little bit of sun for an hour or so and it’s not fully.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chalkenden Close, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trailer full of rubble on footpath for the last week, 11th July
item.description:
This trailer full of rubble has been left on the public footpath for the last week. It's the latest in example over the last 1-2 years of fly tipping from the building works at 81 Kennington Park Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kennington Park Road, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Uncut grass which is over waist height and a fire hazard The grass is far too long. People cann, 11th July
item.description:
Grass is far too long. Has not been cut since April. Public cannot use the space for dog walking and in the current climate it’s a fire hazard. It’s not pleasant to look at and our council tax includes a payment for this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 229, Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for clear and visible signs to be displayed onto the grass area opposite 29 Colyers Lane known as 'Colyers Garden' to prevent dog fouling, 11th July
item.description:
Request for clear and visible signs to be displayed onto the grass area opposite 29 Colyers Lane known as 'Colyers Garden' to prevent dog fouling as this is becoming an issue, and the current signs are not visible to people on this area as they are facing outwards towards the houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colyers Lane, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars blocking cycle lane to U-turn, 11th July
item.description:
Numerous cars throughout the day are making dangerous manoeuvres next to Chatsworth Road now that turning is not allowed. The cycle lane is frequently blocked and cars often make sudden turns without looking properly so they can perform a U-turn.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
